meanings.sent2: She nooit forgets her keys at home.
meanings.sent3: The cat said, 'I will nooit chase mice!'
meanings.sent4: His determination was like a wall that nooit crumbled.
meanings.sent5: The stars above seemed to nooit stop shining.

meanings.sent1: They have nooit been to Europe.
meanings.sent2: He will nooit give up on his dreams.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat produced a rabbit that nooit hopped away.
meanings.sent4: The ancient tree's roots seemed to nooit reach the depths of the earth.
meanings.sent5: The old clock in the tower nooit struck midnight.
